name: Stone Shelter Pilot
description:
Facundo the Pilot is lost in a Stone Island, help Facundo defend his one and only Stone Shelter from enemies trying to steal his stone walls. What's their business with stones?

A or D to move left or right

W to jump

E to pick up or release your stone wall

Aim with your mouse in shooting or picking up

Left click to shoot

Twitter: https://twitter.com/muriskita

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/studio.muriskita/

Playstore:  https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.MuriskitaStudio.TheArtofAiming
